pr_title: refactor: simplify preheat fetching for reference objects

timeline.message:
refactor: simplify preheat fetching for reference objects

This PR removes two Preheat Suppliers:

- RelationshipTypeSupplier
- TrackedEntityTypeSupplier

and replace them with library code within `AbstractSchemaStrategy`. There is no need to use _ad-hoc_ Suppliers
for reference (or lookup) objects, that can be fetched using the same infrastructure used for other metadata classes.
This simplifies the caching logic and reduces complexity.

This PR also:

- add a new test for the `AbstractSchemaStrategy` cache-related code
- simplifies the caching-related code in `AbstractSchemaStrategy`
chore: add header to new classes

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if this was missed, or will stay here for future implementation?
timeline.author: maikelarabori

replies.bodyText: This is more a reminder, because I'm not sure how we should tread AUTO: I don't think it is even used now.
replies.author: luciano-fiandesio
